obfuscation: I state what be matter, and you were crying when myself spoke to you, and oh; nothing; and beautiful evening-that 's everything; cheer in the air; and cheer inside air; as you are not lonely just like me, and myself say how 'd you how 'd you get into this?
original: I say; what's the matter? You were crying when I spoke to you. Oh! nothing. The beautiful evening-that's all. Cheer up! Cheer up! You are not lonelee, like me. I say, how did you how did you get into this?

obfuscation: Is n't it awfully hopeless sort inside living; eyes it eyes; and you had been hurt, and just out in hospital to-day, yet the awful war-- all the misery is because inside the war; when will it end; myself say what nationality are you; as rooshian, really!
original: Isn't it an awfully hopeless sort of life? Yees, it ees. You haf been wounded? Just out of hospital to-day. The horrible war--all the misery is because of the war. When will it end? I say, what nationality are you? Rooshian. Really!

obfuscation: I never met a Russian daughter; and myself say is it as improper as they make out, yet not when I had anyone as ni-ice as you I never had had though; you stopped ' cause I was sad others stop ' cause I am gay.
original: I never met a Russian girl. I say, is it as bad as they make out? Not when I haf anyone as ni-ice as you; I never haf had, though. You stopped because I was sad, others stop because I am gay.

obfuscation: I am not fond in men at everything; as when you know-- be you not fond inside them; as well you barely know them at their best do you; and you will see ' em inside the trenches; and by George, and they are simply splendid-- officers also men every blessed soul.
original: I am not fond of men at all. When you know--you are not fond of them. Well, you hardly know them at their best, do you? You should see them in the trenches. By George! They're simply splendid--officers and men, every blessed soul.

obfuscation: There 's never been anything like it-- only one long bit of jolly fine self-sacrifice it 's perfectly amazing; and myself expect you be not last at this; you see inside them what you had inside yourself I 're thinking, and oh not bit you be quite out!
original: There's never been anything like it--just one long bit of jolly fine self-sacrifice; it's perfectly amazing. I expect you are not the last at that. You see in them what you haf in yourself, I think. Oh, not a bit; you're quite out!

obfuscation: myself assure you when our own serves made attack where I got wounded there was not single man inside my regiment who was not an absolute hero, as way they went inside-- never thinking of themselves-- it was simply lipping, it 's the same too perhaps along-- enemy.
original: I assure you when we made the attack where I got wounded there wasn't a single man in my regiment who wasn't an absolute hero. The way they went in--never thinking of themselves--it was simply ripping. It is the same too, perhaps, with--the enemy.

obfuscation: Oh yes, yet i know this; as ah; yet you be not mean due, yet how myself hate mean men; oh; and they 're not mean really-- they simply do not understand, oh; yet you are a babe-- good babe be not you; and but I li-ke you for it.
original: Oh, yes! I know that. Ah! You are not a mean man. How I hate mean men! Oh! they're not mean really--they simply don't understand. Oh! You are a babee--a good babee aren't you? But I li-ke you for it.

obfuscation: It is so good to find a ni-ice man; and about being lonely; and have not you any Russian friends, and rooshian; no; as city be so been, and were you at the concert before you talked to me, yet yes, myself too; yet i life music; i suppose all Russians do.
original: It is so good to find a ni-ice man. About being lonely? Haven't you any Russian friends? Rooshian? No. The town is so beeg. Were you at the concert before you spoke to me? Yes. I too. I lofe music. I suppose all Russians do.

obfuscation: myself go there always when myself had the money, and what, are you as badly on rocks as this?
original: I go there always when I haf the money. What! Are you as badly on the rocks as that?
